document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Schoenherr, C. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Schoenherr, C. J. (1835) Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 3 (1). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Kazakhstan , Siberia, Levant, Iran ; introduced in North America ( Caldara 2013a ).

Material examined.

: 6 spec. ( ZIN ) Tauria , Alushta , 1889
;

Biology. Meadows, forest edge, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in V–VIII. On Fabaceae :
Trifolium arvense
,
T. campestre
,
T. pratense
,
T. repens
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Smreczyński 1972 );
T. aureum ( Ioannisiani 1972 )
;
T. hybridum ( Dieckmann 1988 )
;
Securigera varia (Isayev 2007)
.
